about_the_game: Your team has been relegated to the bottom tier. With a squad full of unhappy players and under strict demands from the board, your task is to ensure promotion by going unbeaten in the league.
detailed_description: Your team has been relegated to the bottom tier. With a squad full of unhappy players and under strict demands from the board, your task is to ensure promotion by going unbeaten in the league.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11.6, 10.12.6, 10.13.6, 10.14.6, 10.15 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo – 1.8 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: macOS 10.14 and later requires Metal 1; macOS 10.13 and earlier requires OpenGL 2.1

name: Football Manager 2021 Touch - Starting from the Bottom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1), 8/8.1, 10 (Update 1803/April 2018 or later) – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (64-bit), Intel Core 2 or AMD Athlon 64 – 2.2 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Your team has been relegated to the bottom tier. With a squad full of unhappy players and under strict demands from the board, your task is to ensure promotion by going unbeaten in the league.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
